column1: Incident must have short_description and description
Incident must include assignment_group or assigned_to
Access requests must include u_requested_access and u_business_justification
All requests must include approval status (approval field not empty)
Requests for Site Creation must include u_request_type and u_business_justification
Requests for Custom Functionality must include u_business_justification and sc_items details
All tickets must include category and subcategory
